body:
Declare @ITObjectID int, @RolID int,@RolObjectMID int 

Declare masterc Cursor Local For 

Select R.RolID From IT15_Roller R Where R.RolID In (182, 237)

Open masterc
Fetch Next From masterc
Into @RolID
While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 Begin



    Declare c Cursor Local For
    Select  OM.ITObjectID, ROM.RolObjectMID 
    From    IT15_ObjectsM OM
	INNER JOIN IT15_RolObjectsM ROM On ROM.ITObjectID = OM.ITObjectID And ROM.RolID = 1
    Where   OM.ITObjectID In (22791, 22789, 25242, 24531, 22780, 24532, 19622, 19626, 22778, 22851, 22754, 24530, 24529, 22751, 22787, 24500, 24885, 23695,
                              22906, 22788, 28447, 25245, 22745, 25240, 24499, 22774, 22793, 22786, 19598, 22783, 22781, 22792, 24617, 22794, 24501, 22779,
                              19603, 19604, 19923, 19606, 19627, 19628, 19630, 19621, 19631, 8273, 8275, 19880, 19989, 20024, 20158, 24619, 24902, 27954,
                              21601, 28144, 28434, 28451, 28453, 28462, 28527, 24542, 24552, 27973, 28103, 28457, 19632, 24550, 24616, 28471
    ) 
	And  Not Exists (SELECT R.RolID FROM IT15_RolObjectsM R Where R.RolID = @RolID And R.ITObjectID = OM.ITObjectID)
	Order By OM.ITObjectID

    Open c
    Fetch Next From c
    Into @ITObjectID,@RolObjectMID
    While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 Begin
		Insert IT15_RolObjectsM (RolID, ITObjectID, ITLanguageID, ITMaxRecords, ITEdit, ITInsert, ITDelete, ITReadOnly, ITWhereText, ITOrderText, ITHTML, ITExcel,
		                              AddDate, AddUser, UpdateDate, UpdateUser, ITExcelIslem, NotOtoInsert, GridMode, ITNavigate, OptimisticLockField)
		
		Select @RolID, ITObjectID, ITLanguageID, ITMaxRecords, ITEdit, ITInsert, ITDelete, ITReadOnly, ITWhereText, ITOrderText, ITHTML, ITExcel,
		                              AddDate, AddUser, UpdateDate, UpdateUser, ITExcelIslem, NotOtoInsert, GridMode, ITNavigate, OptimisticLockField 
									  From IT15_RolObjectsM ROM Where ROM.ITObjectID = @ITObjectID And ROM.RolID = 1

        Exec SP15_ITMKopyalaNesneToRol @ITObjectID = @ITObjectID, @SourceRolObjectMID = @RolObjectMID, @SourceRolID = 1, @TargetRolID = @RolID
		
        Fetch Next From c
        Into @ITObjectID,@RolObjectMID
    End
    Close c
    Deallocate c



    Fetch Next From masterc
    Into @RolID
End
Close masterc
Deallocate masterc
